website_summaries.verdict: Your kids can play all day in this pool from Bestway, thanks to its UV-resistant sunshade.
pros: Canopy holds up to wind, as long as the pool is filled
Includes a UV-resistant shade to protect you from the summer sun
Protects pool from sun damage, too
Water sprayer on top of the shade keeps the pool cool
Rust-resistant, galvanized metal frame and heavy-duty PVC and polyester 3-ply side walls
cons: Cannot put a pre-made pool cover on this model because the shade poles get in the way
Consider using mosquito netting or a tarp if covering is important to you

customer_reviews.title: Great pool and easy to put together. Added items to make it even better.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together! Hooked up a Intex pool filter that was simple to do. I also bought a patio umbrella bug net to keep out debris. Last item was chlorine tablet float. Water is really clear and the mist is a hit with my dog. I would not recommend dogs over 40lbs. Added solar floating lights.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: great product Used a Umbrella mosquito screen over it
customer_reviews.text: great product Used a Umbrella mosquito screen over it , no leafs, no insects, clean pool :)
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Our Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nicer than I imagined. All rods are steel and the liner is very thick. The canopy really throws a lot of shade and we never feel beat up by the sun! I purchased separately an Intex filter that moves 500 gallons per hour. We haven't tried the misting feature but from reading other reviews I think we'll be careful and not use too much pressure. It's absolutely great for my 2 grandchildren (2 1/2 & 1).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally AWESOME and Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, perfect for Arizona summers! I would highly recommend getting the filter and chlorine tab dispenser recommended to keep your water in good condition. Still on the search for a cover.... Shade is easy to pull off of you see a storm coming. My whole family had used this! Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Still Great After 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandchildren to use in our West facing back yard over 2 years ago. The pool top is the one feature that lets them use a pool without burning in the direct hot sun. We've had to take it down over the winter and reassemble in the summer every year but it's gone together beautifully each year. Wiping down the liner with bleach and letting it dry completely before storing is imperative. I'm hoping they'll make a larger size when the kids outgrow this one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walz

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this. For the price it's very well made. I was worried when we had some storms blow through because we can get some really high winds, but the canopy held up without a problem. A bit bigger than I envisioned, but it still works for our space. The kids are in it almost constantly, and I fully anticipate being able to pack it away once pool season has ended and enjoy it again later.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! No tools needed to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimming pool. Very easy to set up especially with NO tools involved or needed. Just plug and play. Gotta love it. Set up in less than 25mins! Just got it with the net to keep the bugs and mosquito out so let's see how it hold up in a couple of months. Will update later. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Pham

customer_reviews.title: Cute pool!
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s just day one but we love it!! Perfect size for small children (mine are almost 5 and almost 7). It was easy to set up but the instructions aren’t exactly detailed. We bought and intex pump and it works great on it. We are glad we don’t have to mess with the put up and take down of the inflatable kiddie pools anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this pool. It is the perfect size for a 2 and 4 year old. This pool is fantastic and so far we haven't had any issues. I bought an Intex pump for it as recommended by other reviews. Hopefully this will help keep it clean all summer! This is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: After 1.5 pool seasons the canopy broke but overall decent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The canopy eventually wore out between the sun and wind. We love this pool. I have 3 not-so-gentle kids that jump and rough-house in it and the pool part is still holding strong. The mister worked for about 30 minutes when we first set it up and then died. Easy to put together and store. Now I'm struggling to find another canopy. You can buy a replacement if you're in Europe but there is nothing available in the US. I've recommended this pool to so many. For the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for the summer so far! It’s super cute! An adult 6’1” can stand straight up in it. The sun canopy works wonderful! Nice size perfect for my 3,5, and occasionally my 11 year old lol we LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Moore-McPeak

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts and no help
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is an awesome Pool. But be aware from who you buy it. I recommend to go target or Walmart and not amazon. I contact seller for missing parts and they knock it off to call Manufacturers with my “warranty”. I had no warranty so I didn’t get my replacements parts, this seller sold it without warranty. 1 Leg is missing and 2 plugs to stop the Water from draining out ... bad package and no help. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It works great we have a pump for it and put a pad under it we have a 5 year old the canopy has withstood rain and storms , adults can get in also
customer_reviews.author: sbailey

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for the product
customer_reviews.text: We install this pool and the only thing I found were a few small leaks in the bottom seam. I sort of expect that. I bought some clear flex seal patches and it sealed the seam great. I placed them on the inside and outside. It was only in two spots. Over all the pool is awesome and I love the canopy to cover the hot sun. The kids love it!!! Be sure to order a small pool pump so it keeps the water clean.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are teeny tiny and don’t explain hat every single piece does. Also, mine came with holes in it! Looks like it would be nice but I don’t like going the extra mile buying all the extra goodies and a tarp to put it on to protect it and then...holes. They need better quality items if they are going to sell at this price. Can’t wait for that water bill now!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and the UV protection is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy set up. We live in a high wind area and thought we would have to take the top off every night. But it has withstood 25mph+ winds for hours at a time multiple times with zero issues. Very easy to set up. And the UV protection is so incredibly important, I would never buy a kiddie pool without it. I’ve had several friends already bring their kids over to play and they are all impressed with the sturdiness and have each bought one for themselves. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Can not use a pump with this pool
customer_reviews.text: No way to add a pump to this. It’s too big for a single use pool. Was disappointed that we have to waste all this water every time we want to use it. It doesn’t leak and if you’re ok with a slimy bottom after a few days of regular water, than go for it. I was hoping to set it up for the summer with a small pump on my deck for the kids and that’s not an option with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It was great, sturdy, and worked all summer. However when taking it down, several of the connector pieces and the clips broke. PVC and sunlight exposure don’t mix. And the pieces seem to be custom made so I can’t find replacements anywhere. It worked extremely well for one summer though. Just invest in a little pump/filter, even having a chlorine floater it gets dirty and dingy after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: DadBodforLife

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I would write a review but they shorted me on parts for the install. It’s missing one of the tubes for the legs, it’s missing the canopy (which is the reasons we purchased it.) it’s also missing the plastic footing for the legs. I’m beyond upset because it was suppose to be a birthday present for my daughter that turns 5 today.
customer_reviews.author: iam_JP

customer_reviews.title: Not 5 star because to drain all the water out is pain
customer_reviews.text: Not 5 star because to drain all the water out is pain in the xxx. The draining hold is about 3 inch above the floor, and leaving 3 inch of water inside trapped. It takes 2 adult to lift one side of the pool and pore everything out, and you might get injured and the pool might be damaged because the support poles are all plastic. They need to come out with a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money with one down side
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Only complaint is that there isn’t a drain at the bottom so you can’t fully drain it without having another strong adult to get the last amount of water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool parts not all included
customer_reviews.text: This pool was missing a leg when I got the pool so I had to go to Lowe’s get a piece of pvc pipe and cut me a piece when I talk to the representative from the place where the pool is made they kept telling me cut the pool and send them a picture of the cut up pool so I could receive a new pool don’t thing anyone should order from H2O2 HGo unless you want to but prices for your pool
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: I like this pool :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months back and have enjoyed it all summer with my family. I would say it’s deep enough for a 7 year and younger. There’s plenty of space for them to flip and flop and dip and slip. The shade has held up well so far just make sure they are tied well. Overall a sturdy pool would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Munoz

customer_reviews.title: It's nice BUT
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pool. Holds water as it should. Reason why it's not giving 5 stars is the rods holding up the umbrella rust very easily and the pool is a two person job to drain out. Be prepared to also buy a pool supplies (pool skimmer, pump, chemicals) to save yourself tons of headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this pool!
customer_reviews.text: We are in Las Vegas where the sun absolutely beats down and destroys things. This pool, so far, is standing up to the elements and my son loves it. I love that it comes with a shade cover to provide him with UV protection. The only drawback was having to purchase a pump separately. The seller needs to create a package with the pump included.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shade
customer_reviews.text: I live in South Florida. This pool is amazing for the kids. The sun beating down in them would limit our outside time. My 8&7 year olds also loved this pool. Heck my husband even relaxed late at night in it. It’s perfect. When this one has finally had it I will be buying it again! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Received broken to PCV T connector and after 4 days tie on cover has came off leaving a hole.!
customer_reviews.text: I received the pool Wednesday and one of connecting the pipes was broken and I contacted them about getting / buying a replacement part and they offered to send me $10 for me to go to a local pool store to buy the part , which will be more than that .Today is Sunday and the strings that ties it down came off and has left a hole in the cover.
customer_reviews.author: toocutensc

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for small children
customer_reviews.text: My children love this pool! They are 5 and 3 and this is the perfect size for them. We did purchase a pool pump to hook up to it and use Chlorine to keep it clean. It is very easy to maintain and so far we have had zero problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rustygirl84

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids, happy mama!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy because I have common sense lol, but instructions could've been better. Great size pool! Perfect for my small yard, but big enough for my 12, 11, 8 & 3 year old to really enjoy it. I love the quality. Tho The umbrella sprinkler could be better especially for the price i payed. Overall i am very eased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Duran

customer_reviews.title: We love it.  Bigger than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy setup. My 4 kids my wife and i all were able to enjoy this pool at the same time. The umbrella is awesome kept a enormous amount of sun out and kept water cool. We bought the net to go over it for bugs and that was a great buy i must say also. I would definitely recommend to the average family trying to have a decent pool without buying a huge one. It also has a mist that comes out of center of the umbrella which is good for keeping cool when not down in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and so is my grandbaby! She absolutely loves it! Plenty of room for her to splash and play even with the parents sitting in it with her to stay cool. Very well made and easy to assemble! I also love the canopy that come with it. It helps to protect her from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So so pleased!! We bought the pump and mosquito net to keep it clean and bug free. Our 2yr old has never been happier and we can play in it with him! Directions are vague but its common sense as you go. Husband and I had it together and filled in just over an hour. Going to be a great summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value-canopy keeps kids out of the direct sun.
customer_reviews.text: This pool works great as a kid's/toddler's pool. You can fill to varying depths depending on the situation. With the round shape and the canopy we bought a zip up screen for an umbrella that slips over top. It keeps the bugs out and the pool clean. This pool turned out better than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great size but..
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited, my husband put it together....then we noticed the hole when we started filling it up. Returned it and already ordered a new one. The boxes did look like they were taped over like it was not original tape.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. It's a little difficult for my 4 year old granddaughter to get in and out of but other than that it's a hit! Easy to install we even had to move it, easy after we emptied it
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! Highly recommend! Well made great for kids and family! Had no issues so far with this pool. The canopy is great! Definitely buy a pool next to keep bugs out you will need it! Great item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool for Grandson During Stay-at-Home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool along w/ a small pump (as recommended by other buyer/reviewers) for my grandson to use while he & his family stay at home during this quarantine time. My son said it was relatively easy to set up & it is a fantastic value for the money; really good size for my grandson to 'swim' & play around in & the misters along w/ the canopy cover are added bonuses. They are very happy w/ the entire pool & highly recommends this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and has held up well
customer_reviews.text: Left this pool out all summer and it has held up perfectly. I did not put the canopy on the top. It works fine with a cheap pump and we will be able to put it back up next summer. Big enough for an adult to lay on a float.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time . The box was very damaged that I was hesitant if it was new or returned . Once I opened it everything seemed new and packaged . Instructions really aren’t the greatest . Mostly went based off of the box and the picture / steps it had on the side . Overall my son loved the pool . Took me appx 1 hour to build since I lost time trying to figure out how to read the instructions . I bought a bug net for it and it’s perfect kept the leaves and flies / bees out . I would recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and all the legs are missing. Customer service is absent as well. You can fill out a form and they will call you back in 2 business days. People I work for a living. I cant wait by the phone for some one to call me at an undetermined time. Oll be sending back
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Good value when it was only $99
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than it appears. But for a child 4 and under its great. The sprinkler is a bonus and I like that it has a canopy. Its sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: It looks adorable and kids love it but.....
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped in two boxes. Assembling it was a little tricky however there is a first time for everything I could do it now in less then 10min. However The mist in the top center is very fragile and its all messed up right after assembly it leaks water everywhere that sucked since kids were all about it, probably the real reason I got this. unfortunately we were all disappointed at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Dexon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome for my 3 and 5 year olds! I actually get in too so donmy older kids! I even hooked up an intact filter to it and floating chlorine tabs! Awesome and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers and young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little pool. Easy to setup and maintain. About $200 total for the pool, pump, some chemicals, and a mosquito net to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gertnerbot

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool for my 5&3year old nieces. I was fi ally able to see it I person and help assemble it this weekend. I'm amazed at the quality and construction of this pool. Very easy to assemble and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Roomy enough for multiple kids to play in. Set up wasn't bad. We did unbox and where missing a pole, I messaged the seller and they emailed back within minutes to apologize and send the missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers and small children.
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love this pool. I was able to set it up on my own with them trying to "help". We love the shade which made it easy to find a bug net. The mister is fun, but would be better if it had a longer hose. The only down side is needing to buy a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Elise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4 year olds!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pool for littles. We have a 4 year old and this is just the perfect size for him and his little friends. The price point is right on for what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Swensen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good little pool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and perfect for my littlest. Big enough for my husband two children and myself to get in and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smiles all day long  Need a little chlorine to keep the bottom from slipping
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My grand kids love this what a great product. I did buy a small filter and screen for the bugs and grass clippings...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R rice

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old granddaughter and she loves it. It's very cute, sturdy and looks great in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes a pool for the family
customer_reviews.text: The pool was a great purchase. Please do your self a favor and purchase mosquito netting and a pool cleaner tools for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mayberry mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This pool is perfect for my grand babies. 5 &2 years old play it it all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and it was the best entertainment of the summer! The sunshade kept us cool and he loved playing in it. The only thing I can say badly about this product is that the misting hose was kind of a joke it didnt work very well but other than that this is a must have product for a child. We just took it down and packed it up for next summer. Super easy to assemble and take apart to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbetha Rabelo

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool, Have in mind that you’ll need a chlorine pills and a portable vacuum for the dirt that accumulates in the floor. I followed the advice of another reviewer and got a mosquito net for it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Our best summer purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool! After going through 5 inflatable pools we decided we needed something that would stand up to two toddlers endless play. This is our first summer with it but I am sure it will last many years to come. Its big enough for 2 adults and 2 toddlers. Easy set up and take down! The sun shade is so nice to have as we don't have any trees in our yard. We filled it up for a BBQ and all of our friends plan to get one too. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wiechert

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool. We went ahead and bought a patio screen cover and a small pool pump to keep it clean. Its a great size for the three of us (2 adults and a child). The canopy helps keep the water cool also. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: For 8-10yr olds. Must have. easy to put together. Drain, clean, pump is not included and advice to get one if swimming will be an everyday thing. Also grab a cover for it. You'll need one.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pool
customer_reviews.text: I love this pool not too big not too small, put a mosquito net over it, perfect
customer_reviews.author: Grace palisay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool is fantastic, its big enough for two adults to sit and soak while our 5 year old splashes around. My one complaint is that we purchased a pool pump by another company (Intex...and it did not last) I wish Best Way made a pump specifically for this pool which is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J Beavers

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. I put it up all by myself too. You can add a filter system if you choose too. My 3 boys love to play in the pool. My 1 year old can hold on to the railing for support, makes me feel better about the pool when im in it with him. High recommended for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: good pool hard to maintain
customer_reviews.text: we just moved to the south where its hot and humid so we like the canopy feature, however draining the pool to clean it is a pain. we will definitely be getting some pool tabs to keep in cleaner longer
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Amazin
customer_reviews.text: This pool is amazing and its huge. Glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean pool
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pool for 3 months now and I love it! My kids are big for the pool but they still enjoy it very much because they don't know how to swim. Also my backyard is small so it fits perfect. Also, when cleaning it you do it fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Keszthely G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. It was a little difficult to figure out how to put it together, the directions weren’t good. However, once we got the hang of it, it turned out to be easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: The sun cover is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The actual pool is fine. The sun cover is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch S

customer_reviews.title: Which only takes a couple minutes overall kids love it and that is all that
customer_reviews.text: The drain should have been put down a little lower. I have to pale out water before i can flip the rest out. Which only takes a couple minutes overall kids love it and that is all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Jeffest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We bought for moms dog and she is 90 lb pitbill and it’s amazing for her, easy to get into and the pool itself is very durable, recommend this product for sure
customer_reviews.author: Micheal L. Byron

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Quality
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by the quality of this pool. The sprayer broke in its second use; however, the pool itself and the shade have held up and the pool does fit two adults and two children playing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great product. Perfect size for my 5 year old and 1 1/2 year old. Just a few things: one buy a pump since it doesn’t come with one, two buy a screen (helps with keeping bugs out), three buy the chlorine dispenser, and four a pool skimmer. Wish they made a bigger pool with cover!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 daughters, and a backyard with no shade. My daughters LOVE this pool! Our backyard is very windy, and so far, it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is the BESTWAY for summertime fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find! The kids just love this! It's big enough that an adult can hop in and play with the little ones! My 5 year tries to swim in it. It's very wide across, not too deep but when filled up you can really enjoy and good dip. We set up a little slide into it, and that was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great pool easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This pool is great! My one big issue is if you don’t use a filter changing out the water is a HUGE pain. Overall worth the money spent. Toddlers love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOURS spent in play by my kids
customer_reviews.text: We buy a pool every summer like this type. Usually the inflatable or intex. BEST ONE I HAVE EVER SPENT MONEY ON. BEST. only downside is doesn't include pump.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment -did not last
customer_reviews.text: This pool lasted less than a week. 5 of the 8 elbows In its frame broke less than 1 week after assembly. The manufacturer’s website promises support, but this product does not even show up in their menu. Utterly disappointed with this item. Will attempt to return or get replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrisco Jackcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 4 and 7 and this pool is perfect for them. I’m 5’5 and I can float on a raft solo it’s perfect for the Arizona heat
customer_reviews.author: crystal ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! We finally filled it up and it’s just perfect kids love it and me n my partner and 3 other adults fit perfectly in it .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Inez Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money  !
customer_reviews.text: Fits up to 3 adult or 4 kids using this summer love the pool make sure you order screen to keep bugs out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to se up
customer_reviews.text: Just received our pool today and i couldn't be more happy with it. Honestly i was scared, i haven't bought anything like this online. But I'm super happy with it. It was easy to set up, so easy myy 3 year old helped me out. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: roxy rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, love the cover! I will buy another one if this one break so
customer_reviews.author: Mom19

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have had pool since June and it has held up respectfully with wind and hail.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a cool down this summer with our 4 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my kids and dogs! Unfortuntly the wind shreaded the shade but I do live in Nebraska so I sorta figured that would happen! But the pool is still usable and a huge hit with my kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed !
customer_reviews.text: Our pool would be have to be placed in the sun all day. This pool with cover allowed the kids to swim for long periods without getting sunburned. And it's easy enough to pack away in original box during winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This pool has been great for our family. However, for the price I wish it came with a pump/filter. Was very easy to put up and the canopy has been very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Best pool❤️
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved this pool🤘😄😄! It awesome thanks so much, everyone ask me where I got it💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have two toddlers and the size its perfect. Not too big or too small. We really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia romo

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this pool it's great for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this pool it's great for the little ones! The UV shade cover and mister is nice to have during these hot summer days! We also purchased a pump to help keep it clean. Good quality and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: We have twins and this is perfect for them. Easy install and we added a filter. Pool is filter ready. The mister is an extra happy component to keep the lids cool.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great pool though
customer_reviews.text: The mister hose split immediately. Great pool though, I love the canopy,
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: 5 kids & they love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love it. There's enough space for them to play around and the canopy keeps them from too much sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pool! There is nothing about it I didnt like
customer_reviews.author: Janet Schleich

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to assemble pool
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! My 13 year old put it together by himself. Way bigger than I thought it would be. Seems extra sturdy. Love the shade. I had a few of friends ask where we got it. My two year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Claire G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a wonderful pool. Quality is much higher than I expected. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M Ramos

customer_reviews.title: My granson’s Happy
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought my grandson. He’s in it everyday. I bought the filter also. I am so happy with the quality of this pool
customer_reviews.author: Betsy A Aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: What made me up set was that the umbrella ripped and came apart when it was a windy day.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and just the right size for me and my 2 grandsons.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it keeps the sun away and my grandchildren love it

customer_reviews.title: Great!

product_meta.title: H2OGO! Splash-in-Shade Play Pool Orange
feature_bullets: It features its own UV-resistant shade for protecting swimmers from the sun's rays.
The Bestway swimming pool has a water sprayer on top of the shade to keep the pool cool.
The pool has strong, rust-resistant, galvanized metal frames that hold up to windy days.
It also has heavy-duty PVC and polyester 3-ply side walls for durability.
The metal swimming pool will help your kids have a blast splashing around during the long summer season.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
